alert.note: Alert for Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 26 at 3:35PM MST until February 26 at 9:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Canon City Vicinity/Eastern Fremont County County. * WHEN...Until 9 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County
